xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor

Interface MessageInterceptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Extension<MessagingContainer>, Interceptor<MessagingContainer>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageInterceptor, DigestInterceptor, ExecuteCommandInterceptor, FromInterceptor, HttpTransportDataInterceptor, LinkContractInterceptor, ManipulatingInterceptor, MessagePolicyInterceptor, RedirectInterceptor, RefInterceptor, SecretTokenInterceptor, SignatureInterceptor, ToInterceptor

    public interface MessageInterceptor
extends Interceptor<MessagingContainer>
    Interceptor that is executed before and after a message is executed.
    Author:
    markus
